product_name: Bladerunner Ice Zoom Ice Skates- Kids' - Special Buy
long_description: Give your young hockey player an edge in the Bladerunner Ice Zoom Ice Skates. Their adjustable system expands 4 full sizes for growing feet, so you can avoid buying new skates every year. Low center of gravity provides good balance and control. Locking buckle, laces and power strap create a secure fit. Hinged, molded cuff offers lateral support and forward flex. Padded velvet liner adds comfort and warmth and eliminates the need to "break in" skates. Carbon steel blades on the Zoom Ice Skates are styled for hockey. Special Buy.
short_description: Give your young hockey player an edge in the Bladerunner Ice Zoom Ice Skates. Their adjustable system expands 4 full sizes for growing feet, so you can avoid buying new skates every year.
